title: Verily
description: An advanced clinical trial management system designed to streamline research processes, Verily Viewpoint Site CTMS digitizes study protocols, enhances user experience to reduce burnout, and optimizes operations for higher-quality and cost-effective trials.

children.value: An advanced clinical trial management system designed to streamline research processes, Verily Viewpoint Site CTMS digitizes study protocols, enhances user experience to reduce burnout, and optimizes operations for higher-quality and cost-effective trials.
